name: String that Appears Only Once
author: Demonlink
info: This FFC script makes a string appear only once.
description: This FFC script makes a string appear only once. Useful for custom Dungeon Intro Strings or miscellaneous strings you want to happen only once.
setup:
Needs std.zh.

D0 is the String ID. 
D1 are the frames the String is delayed until it's displayed. 

1.- Compile your script.
2.- Attach it to an FFC and edit D0 and D1 to what it corresponds. 
3.- Test and enjoy!
